title: Textile, 2002-17-4, ca. 1990–98
medium:
Medium: polyester filament, stainless steel coating 
Technique:  plain weave polyester followed by calendar pressing and spatter-plating stainless steel and embossing
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 1282.7 x 114.9 cm (42 ft. 1 in. x 45 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of The Museum of Modern Art, courtesy of the designer
description: Yardage of full manufactured width, silver-colored, metallic coated plain woven polyester with wavy linear pattern from the embossing
